text: Patrick James Duggan Jr. (September 28, 1933 â€“ March 18, 2020) was an American politician and lawyer. He was a Senior United States District Judge of the United States District Court for the Eastern District of Michigan from 1986 to 2001. He was nominated by President Ronald Reagan. Duggan was a member of the Republican Party. He was born in Detroit, Michigan. His son, Mike Duggan, was the Mayor of Detroit. Duggan died on March 18, 2020 in Detroit, aged 86. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Lawyers from Detroit Category:American judges Category:Politicians from Detroit Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Patrick J. Duggan
